title: I had to reset my phone, it is not restoring my Google Drive Back up
content:
Hi there
Unfortunately I had to reset my phone back to stock
I want to back it up to how it was before this, but the options it is giving me are not the same as I see on Google Drive (50 apps)
What can I do?
Edit: https://imgur.com/a/qhHM2Ws
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device
